entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
